remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件包含项的集合。A control contains a collection of items. 这些项属于类。These items are of the class. 提供默认呈现时控件表示对象使用其属性。When providing default rendering, the control represents a object using its property. 在模板化呈现时，模板可以呈现的任何所需的属性对象或关联的数据绑定对象。In templated rendering, the template can render any desired property of a object or associated data-bound object. 当你创建委托控件，需要标识处理事件的方法。When you create a delegate for a control, you identify the method that handles the event. 控件生成项事件时通知该处理程序。The control notifies the handler when an item event is generated. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
